title: Teacher Professional Development Design Summit for Supporting High-Ability Students

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational theory knowledge and science curriculum comprehension
context.additional_context: Analyzes real-world cases of supporting high-ability students and develops educational prototypes through design summit methodologies for preservice and in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three characteristics and educational needs of high-ability students.
Learners can design at least one teacher training prototype applying the Design Summit phase.
Learners can perform the process of improving educational materials by incorporating feedback from diverse stakeholders at least twice.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
